metadata.title: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question. - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership
metadata.description: At Inteli, the use of AI in entrance exams and education is not "yes" or "no": it depends on the context and the pedagogical intention to train complete leaders.

content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: Withregistration for the Inteli entrance exam is open,this is the question I hear the most. And my answer frustrates anyone looking for a simple "yes" or "no". The debate onAI in educationoften falls into an unhelpful polarity:
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: The Apocalyptics:They want to ban everything, training "pure" talent, but disconnected from reality and the tools that define the market.
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: The Na√Øve:They release general information, at the risk of forming mere "prompt operators", with atrophied critical thinking and fundamentals.
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: Here at Inteli, our motto for the selection process is "Between theory and practice, choose both". And that dictates our approach. AI doesn't change the fundamentals of thinking (Define, Abstract, Calculate, Interpret), it just brutally speeds up "Calculate".
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: That's why the only intelligent response is pedagogical intent. We have created a framework that guides the use of AI based on the competence we want to develop or assess.
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: When do we ban it?
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: In synchronous stages where the aim is to assess fundamental logical reasoning. If you don't know how to build the foundations of computational thinking on your own, the best tool in the world won't save you.
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: When do we stimulate?
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: In asynchronous stages and especially in our projects(PBL). Here, we expect students to use AI as a co-pilot to accelerate ideation, prototyping and solving complex problems. The focus is on the application and the result, not the tool.
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: Training professionals for the future is not a matter of easy answers. It requires courageous and intentionaleducational design.
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.

content_blocks.text: And how is this tension managed in your organization? Is there a clear framework in place or is there a "save yourself if you can" approach?
content_blocks.section: Can you use AI in our entrance exam? The answer is: it depends on the question.
